title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 11 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park Ferry Hill Plantation Open      Location: Ferry Hill Plantation, Sharpsburg Maryland Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/27/2016 to 09/04/2016 Visitor Center open for season View Details      Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park Great Falls Canal Boat Rides      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM,1:30 PM to 2:30 PM,3:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Great Falls Tavern Fees: $8.00 for adults (ages 16-61), $6.00 for seniors (ages 62 +), and $5.00 for children (ages 4-15)     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/03/2016 to 09/04/2016 Ride along the historic C&O Canal in a boat pulled by mules. Experience rising 8 feet in a lock. Hear park rangers in period clothing describe what life was like for the families that lived and worked on the canal.  View Details      Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park Hancock Visitor Center Open      Location: Bowles House Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/20/2016 to 09/04/2016 Visitor Center open View Details      Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park Williamsport Replica Launch Boat Rides      Time: 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM,1:30 PM to 2:30 PM,3:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Williamsport Visitor Center at the Cushwa Basin  Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/21/2016 to 09/04/2016 Enjoy life on the canal during a replica canal launch boat program at Williamsport. This FREE 1 hour Program includes a short walk, boat ride, tour of Lock House 44, and a lock demonstration. View Details               Great Falls Tavern in the Snow NPS  Year round you can find special events happening up and down the canal. Check back often for updates to the calendar!
